ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Ghost Aggressors
ComicInfo.Summary:
Once every generation, Bloay's Pizza Hog holds the coveted Bloatyshorts Giveaway Night. Gaz is determined to attend this once-in-a-lifetime event, but it's Dib's turn to choose the restaurant for the Membrane family dinner! Can Gaz sway Dib by actually being nice to him? Or will she brutally murder him with kindness?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Warren Wucinich | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Bill Martin | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 23:18:14. [CVDB554052]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dib Membrane, Gaz Membrane, Professor Membrane, Recap Kid, Zim
